description: I am a fun-loving, hard-working, small town woman. There is more to life than meets the eye, and I want to explore, just not on my own or with a bunch of strangers. I am here to meet would-be-friends/partner/, chat till the sun comes up and go exploring together. I have travelled a little bit, but there is still so much more to discover. I read quite a lot, like to cook, dabble in the garden, even enjoy a live show now and again.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
